chapters.title: Chapter 22: The End of a Legend
chapters.info: Old Snert, p. 358—Innkeeper at an inn near the Royal Palace in Caemlyn. He is quite ugly—one eye, several teeth missing, and nearly bald. Mat thinks he may be the ugliest man he has ever seen. He is friends with Birgitte. She says that if he were younger and had his nose broken a few times, she might actually be interested in him. He has a big chest, with some wisps of curly hair on his head. He makes what Mat describes as “ugly” beer.
